title: Listener Stories: Vol. 29
description:
IT’S BIRTHDAY MONTH! And we’re celebrating with haunted twins, handsy ghosts, and black-eyed strangers. Is this week’s theme cheese? Sweden? Demonic intervention? Spoiler alert: we still don’t know. But be sure to stay tuned for next week’s theme, CHEESE AND COWBOYS. 
Please consider supporting the companies that support us! 
Get 20% off your first custom shampoo/conditioner formula at http://functionofbeauty.com/DRINK
Try a better way to get birth control with Simple Health by going to http://simplehealth.com/drink or enter DRINK at checkout.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
